plugins.name: Find Duplicates
plugins.description: Effortlessly manage your Figma layers with this plugin that scans the root-level children of a selected node and identifies duplicates by name. Save time by automatically selecting all nodes with identical names, ensuring a clean and organized design structure. Ideal for designers working with complex hierarchies and naming conventions
plugins.tagline: Find and Select Nodes with Duplicate Names at Root Level

120277.name: Find Duplicates
120277.description: Effortlessly manage your Figma layers with this plugin that scans the root-level children of a selected node and identifies duplicates by name. Save time by automatically selecting all nodes with identical names, ensuring a clean and organized design structure. Ideal for designers working with complex hierarchies and naming conventions
120277.tagline: Find and Select Nodes with Duplicate Names at Root Level

plugins.name: Starter Blueprint
plugins.description: Starter Blueprint is the ultimate Figma plugin to streamline your project setup. With just one click, automatically generate essential pages for wireframes, UI design, and design systems, helping you stay organized from day one. Whether you're building a new interface, creating reusable components, or setting up your design guidelines, Starter Blueprint simplifies the process, letting you focus on the creative side. With future updates bringing even more customizable templates and features, Starter Blueprint is your go-to tool for a smarter, more efficient workflow.
plugins.tagline: Launch Your Figma Projects with a Solid Starting Point!

plugins.name: Page Assistant
plugins.description:
A 🗂️ Page Assistant to help you quickly set up your files and pages structure the way you want them; on new or existing files. No more need for duplicating template files.


§ Sections

Automatically apply your desired file sections with dividers on existing or new files.


⚙️ Customizable

Customize these sections name and order to your specific needs, and save your preferences for future use.


✏️ Page names

Batch-apply a page name prefix and/or suffix to all non-section pages.


This is a work in progress. All feedback is welcome!

accepted.name: alfonso
accepted.description:
Designer and artist from Uruguay, based in New York City.

Currently Director, Product Design at Fabric Health. Ex. Particle Health

plugins.tagline: Add and remove sections on your file & format page names

plugins.name: ChromaPulse
plugins.description:
“ChromaPulse” is an image color analysis plugin of Figma, that extracts dominant and prominent colors from nodes which are filled with an image and generates palettes.


***** This plugin is a one-time paid plugin, with up to 5 trials available. *****


👉 Check out the details on ChromaPulse Website.

🔑 You can buy a License Key on Gumroad.


//


“ChromaPulse” は塗りに画像が設定されたノードのドミナントカラー（支配色）やプロミネントカラー（特長色）を抽出し、パレットを生成する Figma で動作する色調解析プラグインです。


***** このプラグインは1回払いの有料プラグインで、5回までのトライアルが可能です。 *****


👉 詳しくは ChromaPulse ウェブサイト をご覧ください。

🔑 ライセンスキーは Gumroad でご購入いただけます。
plugins.tagline: ChromaPulse is an image color analysis plugin of Figma, that extracts dominant and prominent colors.

plugins.name: StyleMe
plugins.description:
"I’ve got a habit of designing tons of projects without color styles—whoops! 😅 And even when I do have styles, I tend to forget about them. 🤦‍♂️ So, I created a plugin that lets me embrace my laziness 🙌 . 🎨 Work smarter, not harder, right? 😉"


🎉 Awesome Features to Keep You Lazy and Stylish:

🕵️‍♀️ Scans your entire document for matching colors—no hunting required!

🎯 Auto-applies styles to elements with exact color matches (magic, right?).

✨ Creates new styles for those sneaky color variants with different opacities.

📊 Gives you a summary of all the styles applied and new ones created—boom!

🌈 Keeps your colors consistent across your designs, so you look like a pro.


Ready to let the plugin do the heavy lifting? 😎

accepted.name: Otutuloro Adeshina
accepted.description: Popularly knows as mide. I am a creative young individual with the drive to help brands and businesses fully harness the power of visuals as a ‘can’t do without

plugins.tagline: This tool will match the styles in your Figma file by applying them to elements with similar colors.

plugins.name: Composer
plugins.description:
Quickly organise your components in a structured grid.

Composer helps you quickly arrange component variants in Figma, making your workspace more organised and efficient.


⚡️ Key features:

  1. Auto-Layout Support.
  2. Easily adjust spacing and positioning to fit your needs.
  3. Structure your components in a clear format up to a 4×4 Grid Layout.
  4. Instantly add a dark background behind selection for better visibility.


Keep your projects clean, organised, and faster to ship into integration! 🚀
plugins.tagline: Composer helps you quickly arrange component variants

121346.name: Composer
121346.description:

Keep your projects clean, organised, and faster to ship into integration! 🚀
121346.tagline: Composer helps you quickly arrange component variants

plugins.name: Mysa Smart Table
plugins.description:
Mysa Smart Table helps design teams, founders, and PMs quickly create clean, UI-aligned tables— customised to their workflow with the right column order for any module or tab.


Built on the Mysa Design System, each row is styled using consistent, production-ready components, ensuring a unified experience across all designs. The underlying data remains constant across variations, supporting seamless collaboration and iteration.


We’ve also introduced a powerful new “Create New” section, where you can choose from the existing columns and build custom tables from scratch — perfect for fast design exploration and iteration.
plugins.tagline: Generate responsive tables instantly using Mysa components

137261.name: Mysa Smart Table
137261.description:
Mysa Smart Table helps design teams, founders, and PMs quickly create clean, UI-aligned tables— customised to their workflow with the right column order for any module or tab.


Built on the Mysa Design System, each row is styled using consistent, production-ready components, ensuring a unified experience across all designs. The underlying data remains constant across variations, supporting seamless collaboration and iteration.


We’ve also introduced a powerful new “Create New” section, where you can choose from the existing columns and build custom tables from scratch — perfect for fast design exploration and iteration.
137261.tagline: Generate responsive tables instantly using Mysa components

plugins.name: Corners Alignment
plugins.description:
主要功能


1. 多矩形圆角对齐

选中多个矩形时：

▸ 自动取最大矩形为基准

▸ 同步小矩形圆角弧度，实现视觉边距等距效果

▸ 非等比例对齐时，按最小间距自动计算


2. 容器内元素圆角对齐

选中 Frame/组件/实例时：

▸ 自动识别为容器

▸ 调整所有首层子元素（矩形/Frame等）的圆角


Main Features


1. Multi-Rectangle Corner Alignment

On selecting multiple rectangles:

▸ Takes largest rectangle as reference

▸ Syncs smaller rectangles' corners for visual equidistance

▸ Uses min-spacing calculation for non-proportional alignment


2. Container Element Alignment

On selecting Frame/Component/Instance:

▸ Identifies as container

▸ Adjusts corners of all top-level child elements
plugins.tagline: 对齐嵌套圆角 Align nested corners

136753.name: Corners Alignment
136753.description:
主要功能


1. 多矩形圆角对齐

选中多个矩形时：

▸ 自动取最大矩形为基准

▸ 同步小矩形圆角弧度，实现视觉边距等距效果

▸ 非等比例对齐时，按最小间距自动计算


2. 容器内元素圆角对齐

选中 Frame/组件/实例时：

▸ 自动识别为容器

▸ 调整所有首层子元素（矩形/Frame等）的圆角


Main Features


1. Multi-Rectangle Corner Alignment

On selecting multiple rectangles:

▸ Takes largest rectangle as reference

▸ Syncs smaller rectangles' corners for visual equidistance

▸ Uses min-spacing calculation for non-proportional alignment


2. Container Element Alignment

On selecting Frame/Component/Instance:

▸ Identifies as container

▸ Adjusts corners of all top-level child elements
136753.release_notes:
增加了ui界面，新增了最小圆角值和平滑圆角值设置，新增了邻近角对齐模式(适用于九宫格之类的网格自动布局)。
Added UI interface, added minimum corner radius and smooth corner radius settings, added adjacent corner alignment mode (suitable for grid automatic layouts such as 3x3 grids).
136753.tagline: 对齐嵌套圆角 Align nested corners

plugins.name: FlipArabic
plugins.description:
Flip frames, change fonts, and translate copy for Arabic layouts. All with one click.

Let FlipArabic handle localization so you can focus on crafting great experiences.


Made for Your Workflow

  1. Save Time - No hours wasted on manual mirroring or font hunting.
  2. Zero Learning Curve - Select a frame or whole sections for multiple frames and convert!
  3. No Details Lost - Padding, nested auto-layouts, absolute elements, and constraints are all taken care of.
  4. Built-in Translation - AI-powered translation that keeps copy in context (big updates coming in this space).
  5. Smart Font Swapping - Auto-matches weights & styles when exact alternatives aren't available.
  6. Smart Skip for Visuals - Icons, logos, shapes, SVGs & flags keep their original direction.


Fine Tune Your Conversion

  1. Add df or don't flip to layer names to skip flipping
  2. Add dfc or don't flip content to frame names to flip position but keep contents unchanged
  3. Add dt or don't translate to text layer names to keep specific text in English
  4. Add dtc or don't translate content to parent frame names to preserve entire text blocks


For support, ideas or general feedback, reach out to fliparabic@gmail.com
plugins.tagline: Convert your designs to Arabic instantly. Flip, change fonts & translate in one click.

  3. No Details Lost - Padding, nested auto-layouts, absolute elements, and constraints are all taken care of.
  4. Built-in Translation - AI-powered translation that keeps copy in context (big updates coming in this space).
  5. Smart Font Swapping - Auto-matches weights & styles when exact alternatives aren't available.
  6. Smart Skip for Visuals - Icons, logos, shapes, SVGs & flags keep their original direction.


Fine Tune Your Conversion

  2. Add dfc or don't flip content to frame names to flip position but keep contents unchanged
  3. Add dt or don't translate to text layer names to keep specific text in English
  4. Add dtc or don't translate content to parent frame names to preserve entire text blocks


For support, ideas or general feedback, reach out to fliparabic@gmail.com

networkAccess.reasoning: Used for secure translation services. Your content stays private and isn't stored

138048.release_notes:
- Smoother performance and stability upgrades.
- Improved translation accuracy and usage reporting.
- Enhanced network access for a more reliable experience.
138048.tagline: Convert your designs to Arabic instantly. Flip, change fonts & translate in one click.

plugins.name: Font Replacer
plugins.description:
Instantly view all fonts used in your selection, selectively replace specific font families, and preserve font weights and styles when switching to new fonts. Whether you're cleaning up inconsistent typography, updating your brand, or exploring new typefaces, Font Replacer makes the process fast, intuitive, and reliable.


  1. See all fonts in your selection at a glance
  2. Replace one or multiple font families with a single click
  3. Maintains font weights/styles (e.g., Bold, Italic) when switching families
  4. Handles mixed-font text layers and nested groups
  5. Smart fallbacks ensure your text always looks great
  6. Clean, modern UI with loading indicators for large selections
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly swap and manage fonts in your Figma designs

134520.name: Font Replacer
134520.description:
Instantly view all fonts used in your selection, selectively replace specific font families, and preserve font weights and styles when switching to new fonts. Whether you're cleaning up inconsistent typography, updating your brand, or exploring new typefaces, Font Replacer makes the process fast, intuitive, and reliable.


  1. See all fonts in your selection at a glance
  2. Replace one or multiple font families with a single click

134520.tagline: Effortlessly swap and manage fonts in your Figma designs

plugins.name: another-data-populator
plugins.description:
Another Data Populator


A Figma plugin that populates your designs with JSON.


How it works


1. Create a Layer Group that contains at least one Text Layer. In the Text Layer content, use placeholders for you data fields in double curly brackets – such as {{firstname}} or {{lastname}}. The plugin will replace all these placeholders with respective data. _Please note that if your Text Layer is called {{name}} (in the Layer List), the content of the Layer will always be overwritten with the data contained in {{name}}. So if you use multiple {{placeholders}} in a Text Layer, you should rename your Layer to something without curly brackets._


2. In the same Layer Group, create a Shape Layer (this is your image placeholder). Give the Shape Layer a placeholder name in double curly brackets – such as {{image}}. The plugin will replace this placeholder with respective image data (PNG or JPG).


3. For JSON arrays, create a Layer Group with a placeholder name like {{items}}. That group must contain one child Group Layer with the name {{template}}. This is the group that will be cloned and populated with the JSON array data. This works recursively with nested data. The array placeholder can have an optional limit filter {{items | limit 5}}, which will limit the number of {{template}} clones.


Available Commands


Populate with Dummy JSON

The plugin includes presets from https://dummyjson.com/ including:


- Products

- Carts

- Recipes

- Users

- Posts

- Comments

- Todos

- Quotes


Populate with Imported JSON

You can also upload any JSON file from your machine.


Filters

By appending your {{placeholder}} with one of the following available filters, separated by a |, you can use certain operations on your populated strings.


1. Maximum characters

You can set the maximum number of characters of your {{placeholder}} by appending it with | max n, 'n' representing the desired number of characters.


{{name | max 3}}


2. Date

Display {{placeholder}} in MM/DD/YYYY format.


{{dateTimeString | date}}


Conditional Actions

A Conditional Action performs a certain action on a Layer Group or Component based on data and a conditional expression. The Conditional Action is controlled by the name of the Layer Group (or Component).


1. #show[condition]

shows layer if true and hides otherwise


2. #hide[condition]

hides layer if true and shows otherwise


2. #duplicate[condition]

duplicate layer n times


3. #variant[condition, component property]

set component property based on condition


Examples

#show[{{firstname}}.length > 3]

shows layer if {{firstname}} has more than 3 characters and hides otherwise


#show[{{firstname}} == "Peter"]

shows layer if {{firstname}} is 'Peter' and hides otherwise


#duplicate[{{rating}}]

duplicates the layer by the value of {{rating}}


#variant[{{completed}}, Value Type = Checked]

sets the component property "Value Type" to "Checked" if {{completed}} is true


You can combine several conditions:


#show[{{firstname}}.includes('e') || {{firstname}}.length > 3]

shows layer if {{firstname}} includes 'e' or has more than 3 characters, hides otherwise


Or several Conditional Actions:


#variant[{{completed}}, Value Type = Checked] #variant[{{completed}}, State = Completed]

sets the component properties "Value Type" to "Checked" and "State" to "Completed" if {{completed}} is true


Pure JavaScript syntax is being used for Conditional Actions, so you can basically use anything available in JavaScript.
plugins.tagline: Populate your designs with JSON

plugins.name: Get Image Type
plugins.description:
A simple plugin that analyzes your selected images and reveals their file formats with a single click. Stop guessing if that asset is a JPG, PNG, SVG, or WebP.


Does not support:

  1. Video/Movie Files: This plugin does not support identification of video or movie formats.


Note: Figma automatically converts certain image formats during import. HEIC and TIFF/TIF files are converted to PNG format when imported into Figma, so the plugin will identify these as PNGs. This reflects the actual format of the image within Figma, not necessarily the original source format.

accepted.name: Farren Wang
accepted.description: Farren's Figma account. Here you'll find stuff she's proud of.

plugins.tagline: Identify the format of images in your Figma designs

Note: Figma automatically converts certain image formats during import. HEIC and TIFF/TIF files are converted to PNG format when imported into Figma, so the plugin will identify these as PNGs. This reflects the actual format of the image within Figma, not necessarily the original source format.

plugins.name: Airlogo
plugins.description:
Designing travel apps, booking websites, or aviation dashboards? Airline Logos makes your workflow faster and cleaner by giving you instant access to hundreds of up-to-date, high-quality airline logos—right inside Figma.


Easily search by airline name, IATA/ICAO code, or country, and drag logos directly into your designs. All logos are optimized for digital use, SVG-based, and consistently styled to save you time and ensure visual harmony across your project.


Perfect for:


Travel & aviation UI/UX designers

Booking platforms and flight aggregators

Prototypes that need real-world branding

No more hunting down logos or worrying about outdated assets. With Airline Logos, your design stays current and cohesive—effortlessly.

plugins.name: Pseudo Localizer for Figma & FigJam
plugins.description:
Design global-ready UIs—without ever leaving Figma.


Skip the guesswork and see how your designs hold up in other languages, scripts, and text directions—instantly. With Pseudo Localizer, you can preview localized versions of your UI in seconds, directly inside Figma or FigJam. No setup, no logins, no external tools. Just you and your design.


ℹ️ What you can do with Pseudo Localizer:


✅ Preview global scripts instantly

Toggle between Latin, Cyrillic, CJK, and Arabic (RTL) with a single click.


✅ Test layout resilience

Stretch or shrink text length from –50% to +50% to spot issues like clipping, wrapping, or misalignment.


✅ Control the scope

Run it on a single button, a card, or the whole page—your call.


✅ Keep it private & fast

Everything happens on your machine. No accounts, no external servers, no privacy worries.


❗️Why it matters:


  1. Catch layout issues before they become bugs.
  2. Give your QA and localization teams better previews.
  3. Design smarter for a global audience—right from the start.


⚙️ How it works:


  1. Select your screens with text layers (or don't select anything to pseudo translate the full page).
  2. Pick your script and text expansion.
  3. Click "Pseudotranslate"—done! A new page appears with your mocked-up, localized content (including RTL adjustments).


✨ Ready to build for every language?

Install Pseudo Localizer from the Figma Community and see how your designs hold up across the globe.


📨 Got feedback? Share it here!

accepted.name: José Jóvena Casañ
accepted.description:
Helping teams make great design work everywhere.
Big on UX, localization, and making things clear across cultures.
Rookie Figma Plugin Author.

plugins.tagline: Instantly pseudotranslate your Figma designs to test global layouts—no setup, no accounts.

Legoify automatically generates a perfect grid of glassmorphic BLOCK bricks that overlay your design, creating that iconic brick aesthetic instantly. Perfect for mockups, presentations, or adding a playful dimension to your projects. Unleash your inner brick artist without the tedious manual work.

plugins.name: Lokki - Comments Export
plugins.description:
Description

A plugin that allows you to turn Figma comments into Jira tasks with a couple of clicks.


Key features

- Export comments to selected Jira project

- Filter comments

- Merge multiple comments into one.

- Turn comment into sub-issue of the existing Jira issue.


How to use

When you run the plugin, it offers a simple 3 step onboarding screen explaining how things work.

  1. During the first run, we'll ask you to connect your plugin with your Jira.
  2. Next you need to generate personal token that allows you access your comments. This is mandatory for plugins operation since Figma do not provide direct access to comments with figma plugin tools.
  3. Select Jira project that you will use as default. You can change it later.
  4. That's it. You can select comments and export them to the Jira.


Sidenote

This is our first-ever plugin on Figma, and while things might not be ideal all at once, we are happy to hear your feedback, questions, and suggestions at dev@lokki.tools

Webpage: https://lokki.tools


Data Security & Network access

Our plugin does not save any remote counterpart, it means your data is only stored on your computer, inside your Figma editor. This applies to all of your data, tokes and comments except user identifier related to the premium status and subscription info.


About

- Idea by Kseniia Pashkovska & Oleksandr Drobinin

- Implementation by Oleksandr Drobinin
plugins.tagline: Turn Figma comments into Jira tasks instantly

  4. That's it. You can select comments and export them to the Jira.

About

plugins.name: Detach Aliases
plugins.description:
Detach Aliases lets you resolve variable's aliased values from their sources. Easily detach a specific group of variables or all variables in a collection. You can target one mode at a time or all modes at once!


  1. Select your collection
  2. Select the target mode or all modes
  3. Enter the path to a group of variables or a single variable (see below for bulk actions)
  4. Detach


Tip

  1. Keep your variable window open to see the changes.
  2. Use the Refresh button to pull in changes to the variables made when the plugin window is open. (see below for copy & paste)
  3. Use clear to quickly delete the path.


Bulk Actions

You will most likely want to run this on a group or the entire collection:

  1. Update all variables within a group by entering the path/to/group
  2. Update all variables in the collection by entering / @all or @root in the path input
  3. You will see all variables which are located in the path and would have aliases detached in the preview panel on the left


Plugin Notes

  1. Variable names and paths are case sensitive
  2. Detaching variables, especially those linked to text styles may take longer to propagate


Copy/Paste Figma Bug

If you copy/paste variables between collections, you may need to reload the tab in order for those variables to register in their new collection.

accepted.name: Murph
accepted.description: Systems Designer • Plugin Author • Rectangle Lover

plugins.tagline: Break your collection aliases en masse!

131967.description:

Copy/Paste Figma Bug

131967.tagline: Break your collection aliases en masse!

plugins.name: Colors to Variables
plugins.description:
✨ Colors to Variables


Save time and stay organized by turning your color swatches into Figma variables — automatically.


How it works:

•Select one or more frames or components

•Each must include a solid fill

•Each must contain a text layer named “Name” (this becomes the variable name)


Your palette, variable-ready.


Perfect for building or maintaining design systems with consistent, reusable color variables.
plugins.tagline: Your palette, variable-ready.

plugins.name: FileDetox
plugins.description: FileDetox is a powerful Figma cleanup tool that hunts down and eliminates the hidden clutter slowing down your design files. With its distinctive neo-brutalist interface, FileDetox quickly identifies hidden layers, empty frames, unused styles, and off-canvas elements that contribute to file bloat. In just a few clicks, purge unnecessary elements and optimize your workflow. Design with intention, not with digital baggage. Made by gautham.
plugins.tagline: Design Detoxification. Simplified.

plugins.name: Simple inspector
plugins.description:
CSS Extractor is a Figma plugin designed to help developers quickly extract CSS styles from selected elements and their children. It supports nested structures, text styles, image fills, and allows for easy image export. The UI provides options to copy the entire style block or individual style lines.


Key Features:


🔍 Display of selected elements and their child hierarchy.


🎨 Conversion of styles to CSS with unit selection: px or rem.


📋 Copy full CSS blocks or individual lines.


🖼 Export image fills directly from elements.
plugins.tagline: Simple inspector css style copy and export source image

127969.description:

plugins.name: Asterisk
plugins.description:
Asterisk creates a personal knowledge system within your Figma files. Add context to any design element with custom tags, notes, and reference links. Quickly search and navigate to specific elements, making complex files manageable. Created for designers who want to add meaningful annotations to their file with contextual search to maintain clarity and effortless navigation.


📝 Add notes and custom tags to any layer in your file

🌐 Add URLs to images for instant access to their source

🔍 Find any element instantly with powerful search and filter functionality

⚡ One-click navigation to any tagged element

*️⃣ Personalise your experience with fully customizable display options


*Free to use while in beta ~ provide feedback for lifetime free access 💚
plugins.tagline: *Add searchable notes, tags, and links to elements to organize, explore, and navigate effortlessly

plugins.name: NornAI - Boost Your Design and Content with AI
plugins.description:
🔮 NornAI: Harness the power of artificial intelligence to transform and adapt your texts, adjusting tone and style to create unique and engaging designs. Inspired by mythology, this plugin offers a magical and personalized experience.




✨ Key Features


Text transformation with predefined tones: standard, success, error, call to action, and more.

Quick suggestions to summarize, expand, simplify, and make text more persuasive or friendly.

Image search and insertion with a special themed interface.



🛠️ How to Use


1. Text Transformation

  1. Select the desired text.
  2. Choose a voice tone or quick suggestion.
  3. Use custom prompts for specific instructions.
  4. Click on one of the generated alternatives to apply.



2. Image Search

  1. Access the "Images" tab.
  2. Enter your search and optionally select a color filter.
  3. Click on an image to insert it into the project.
plugins.tagline: Enhance your design workfklow with AI

plugins.name: Size Sync
plugins.description:
A convenient plugin for aligning sizes of multiple selected objects. Easily batch resize objects to match maximum/minimum widths or heights. Compatible with various objects including groups, frames, and shapes. Streamline your layout with 4 simple commands. Set up shortcuts for even faster workflow. Perfect for when you just need to match sizes without specifying exact width values - simple and efficient.


複数のオブジェクトを選択して、サイズを簡単に揃えることができるプラグインです。最大/最小の幅や高さに合わせて一括リサイズが可能です。グループ、フレーム、シェイプなど、様々なオブジェクトに対応しています。4つのコマンドで素早くレイアウトを整えることができます。ショートカットを設定することでクイックな作業を実現します。widthを数値で指定する必要がなく、ただ同じサイズに揃えたいだけのときに便利です。

plugins.name: QuickToken
plugins.description:
QuickToken is the Figma plugin that enables instant variable import and seamless organization. Designed for designers who prioritize efficiency, QuickToken allows you to quickly insert variables into Figma’s local variables as design tokens. It supports collections and groups, keeping all variables clear and organized. Simplify your variable management and speed up your workflow with this powerful, efficient plugin!


Supported name schemes:


Create Variable Collection

#Collection


Create Variable Group

Group/


Create Variable

variable-name: value


The variable type recognition is automatically

based on the variable value itself.


Supported variable types


  1. Float 30
  2. Colors #333, #334455, rgb(0,100,100), rgba(2,2,2,0.1)
  3. Boolean: true, false
  4. String: 'Hello'
  5. Variable link: var(variable-name)

accepted.name: Roland Hidvegi
accepted.description: Roland Hidvegi is a Product Designer — crafting digital experiences, from vision to final touches, passionate about creating things that make people happy.

plugins.tagline: Instant variable import and organization in Figma.

  1. Float 30
  2. Colors #333, #334455, rgb(0,100,100), rgba(2,2,2,0.1)
  3. Boolean: true, false
  4. String: 'Hello'
  5. Variable link: var(variable-name)
107967.tagline: Instant variable import and organization in Figma.

plugins.name: DxH - Layer2JSON
plugins.description: DxH - Layer2JSON is a Figma plugin by Devxhub Ltd. that exports design layers (text, images, shapes) to structured JSON format. Perfect for developers looking to integrate Figma designs into apps or workflows, it supports nested layers and exports essential design properties like size, position, and styles.
plugins.tagline: DxH - Layer2JSON is a plugin that exports design layers (text, images, shapes) as structured JSON.

plugins.name: CopyCraft
plugins.description:
Streamline your text editing workflow with a powerful tool that helps you manage and edit text content across your Figma designs with precision and ease.

How it Works:


Text Loading:

Select any frame or text element in your Figma document and load it into the editor with a single click.


Smart Organization:

  1. Texts are automatically grouped by their parent elements (Frames, Components, or Groups)
  2. Each text element shows its character count and previous versions
  3. Intuitive interface for quick access to all text elements


Efficient Editing:

  1. Edit multiple text elements simultaneously
  2. Apply text styles directly from the editor
  3. Preview changes in real-time
  4. Navigate quickly to specific elements in your design


Key Features:

  1. Character counter for precise text control
  2. Previous version tracking for each text element
  3. Direct navigation to elements in your design
  4. Batch saving capabilities for groups of text
  5. Support for text styles application


Perfect for teams working on large-scale designs where maintaining text consistency and efficiency in editing is crucial.
plugins.tagline: Text Management Made Simple
